Description: The following statement contains a magic number: CustomActionEntity _entity = new CustomActionEntity()              {                  Name = "CA_SITE_SETTINGS_SITECLASSIFICATION"'                  Group = "SiteTasks"'                  Location = "Microsoft.SharePoint.SiteSettings"'                  Title = "Site Classification"'                  Sequence = 1000'                  Url = string.Format(hostUrl' ctx.Url)'                  Rights = _manageWebPermission'              };
